text: Motahar Uddin (24 August 1935 - 10 January 1974) is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the former Member of Parliament of Barisal-3. ==Career== Uddin was elected to parliament from Barisal-3 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 1973. He founded Surjamoni New Model Secondary School. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:1935 births Category:1st Jatiya Sangsad members Category:1974 deaths
title: Motahar Uddin
